Oct 26 .... Have you guys had any spotting ?
Due date is oct 26 I'm 9 weeks today with my second child. My first is almost 5yr. I haven't had any spotting but with my son I had it the first week
No spottinh but  I've heard its normal to have a little spotting

Nope no spotting for me. Just a lot of movement. I have type 2 diabetes so my babies end up larger then average babies lol so it's technically not the size of a lime for me like they say it should be at 12 weeks lol. Everyone needs to come back here and announce what their having! I feel that mine is a girl but we'll find out soon ;) bf wants a boy!
